creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Central rectangular field with ikat design of hearts, crosses and stairs; ends have 20 inches of open work depicting birds, rabbits, and potted plants; band of organic wave pattern and fringe at both short ends
markings: \'RECUERDO\' woven into both short ends before fringe
title: Shawl
